blogPost.excerpt: Gleek.io is a diagram maker focused on speed ⏱ - typing code is much faster than drag-and-drop - for developers, it is more natural to write than to draw - generate a diagram with connections Create your first diagram in Gleek.io & write your feedback 🙏
blogPost.body: Gleek.io is a diagram maker focused on speed ⏱ - typing code is much faster than drag-and-drop - for developers, it is more natural to write than to draw - generate a diagram with connections Create your first diagram in Gleek.io & write your feedback 🙏
blogPost.title: Gleek - Free online diagramming tool for developers
blogPost.author: Thomas Schranz ⛄️

localize.description: Gleek.io是一个专注于速度的图表制作器 ⏱ - 输入代码比拖拽快得多 - 对于开发者来说，写比画更自然 - 生成一个有连接的图表 在Gleek.io中创建你的第一个图表并写下你的反馈 🙏
localize.tagline: 开发者的免费在线制图工具

localize.description: Gleek.io是一個專注於速度的圖表製作器 ⏱ - 輸入代碼比拖拽快得多 - 對於開發者來說，寫比畫更自然 - 生成一個有連接的圖表 在Gleek.io中創建你的第一個圖表並寫下你的反饋 🙏
localize.tagline: 開發者的免費在線製圖工具

previous.excerpt: Poser is a vector illustration pack that includes 20 unique illustrated poses that can be used to emphasize key features of your products and/or services. We have a 25% discount for Product Hunt buyers https://gumroad.com/l/YkhLs/poser-25-ph
previous.title: Poser illustrations - Customizable illustrations for your projects

localize.tagline: 爲您的項目提供可定製的插圖
